metadata.title: CVE-2023-1390 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A remote denial of service vulnerability was found in the Linux kernelâ€™sTIPC kernel module. The while loop in tipc_link_xmit() hits an unknownstate while attempting to parse SKBs, which are not in the queue. Sendingtwo small UDP packets to a system with a UDP bearer results in the CPUutilization for the system to instantly spike to 100%, causing a denial ofservice condition.
